channel.title: Generative AI on FinanClub
channel.description: Recent content in Generative AI on FinanClub

item.title: META
item.description: score:-55 Chances: Nvidia has reached an all-time high in trading and shows few signs of slowing down. Apple has made forays into generative AI, with potential for expansion of Apple Ferret and AI chips. Microsoft and OpenAI won the headline battle last year for generative AI.

item.title: IBM
item.description: score:247 Chances: IBM closed at $185.03 in the latest trading session, marking a -0.15% move from the prior day. IBM announced the availability of the popular open-source Mixtral-8x7B large language model (LLM) on its watsonx AI and data platform, as it continues to expand capabilities to help clients innovate.

item.title: CRWD
item.description: score:172 Chances: CrowdStrike (CRWD) has received quite a bit of attention from Zacks.com users lately. Shares of cybersecurity company CrowdStrike (NASDAQ:CRWD) jumped 5.4% in the afternoon session after Morgan Stanley analyst Hamza Fodderwala upgraded the stock’s rating from Equal-Weight (Hold) to Overweight (Buy) and raised the price target from $203 to $304.
